conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls are extruded with thickness, multiple wall faces are visible, and the camera is elevated/angled with the ceiling removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion and readable room volumes; clean cutaway and stable perspective. Minor simplification/softness in some wall corner detailing and openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room count and adjacency largely match (kitchen/dining left, living central, bedrooms right, bath near center-bottom/right, entry/hall bottom). Some partitions/closet and hallway wall shapes appear simplified or slightly shifted; not all door locations/swings and window placements are clearly or accurately represented.

interior_elements.notes: Major elements present (kitchen counters, dining table, seating, bed, bathroom fixtures). Some rooms (e.g., laundry/closets) appear minimally furnished or ambiguous.

visual_clarity.notes: Good readability of walls/floors with adequate lighting. Openings/frames are somewhat indistinct, reducing clarity for door/window verification; otherwise clean presentation with no UI/text clutter.

detected_errors.description: Doors/windows are not fully or clearly mapped to the 2D plan (several openings are simplified; door swings largely absent).
Minor layout distortion/simplification in internal partitions (hall/closet/bath area geometry does not perfectly match the 2D wall lines).
Laundry/closet-related furnishing is minimal/unclear compared to labeled functional spaces in the plan.

summary: A valid and convincing 3D cutaway with mostly faithful room layout, but with simplified/mismatched openings and some internal partition deviations from the 2D plan.
